subject: JUnit BOF at XPU
msgSnippet: Just a reminder for those who haven t yet left for XPU (XP/AU?) and are joining us, I will be organizing a Birds of a Feather meeting about JUnit, at Erik
messageBody:
Just a reminder for those who haven't yet left for XPU (XP/AU?) and are
joining us, I will be organizing a Birds of a Feather meeting about
JUnit, at Erik Meade's request. The topics of discussion include
extending JUnit, and I will be talking a little about HTMLUnit, Mike
Bowler's HTML extensions to JUnit, an alternative to HttpUnit.

Please be on the lookout for the schedule of BOF meetings, wherever
that will be. I look forward to seeing you there!
J. B. Rainsberger,
President, Diaspar Software Services
Let's write software that people understand.
http://www.diasparsoftware.com/
